``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - Medial tubercle of calcaneal tuberosity @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Plantar aponeurosis @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} - 5th toe (Base of proximal phalanx) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - 5th metatarsal at tuberosity @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Lateral Plantar N.]({{< var ref-lateral-plantar-nerve.path >}}) ([S1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s1 >}}), [S2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s2 >}}), [S3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s3 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **5th MTP**: Flexion, ABD @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Longitudinal Arch**: Support @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # MMT
